segments.text: This kitchen scene is truly exasperating, I must say.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m looking at this woman, drying a plate while water floods her kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing continuously, making a terrible mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is standing directly in the growing puddle, yet she shows no reaction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so utterly oblivious to their immediate surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinet doors are getting soaked; this will surely lead to damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a complete disregard for her home and possessions.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And then there are the children, engaging in dangerous mischief behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That wobbly stool and cookie theft are just waiting to go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her lack of attention is putting everyone at risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of water damage to the floorboards makes me cringe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation just fills me with a sense of irritation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to snap her out of her trance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a shocking display of inattentiveness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the water sloshing around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR
